overview: When his best friend dies of a heart attack, Ray Macklin becomes a man obsessed with his own mortality. Convinced that all his aches and pains are an indication of his imminent death, Ray's life turns into a slapstick farce of health-crazed anxiety and hypochondria.
tagline: Nine Out of Ten Doctors Say Ray Is Perfectly Healthy. But What Do They Know?
title: Checking Out
